name: Bizarre Puppy Triangle
description:
Control Sine and Cosine, your two loyal phantom puppies  who can zap anyone who gets between them. The pups have a short attention span and can only stay in position for a limited time , so use your time wisely!

Waves of enemies will come at you, evade their bullets and the enemies themselves!

Dog walking never felt so satisfying!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • LMB/RMB to send the pups to location
  • Space to zap when they're in place.
